welcome_message_body: Welcome to Khartoum North, where the confluence of the Blue and White Nile rivers creates a charming and unique atmosphere. Explore the city's rich history, vibrant markets, and welcoming people as you enjoy your time here.

restaurants.name: Samakna (سمكنا)
restaurants.description: Samakna (سمكنا) is a fish and chips shop located in Burrī ad Darā’isah.
restaurants.address: شارع المعرض, Burrī ad Darā’isah, Al Kharţoum

restaurants.name: M Burger Joint
restaurants.description: M Burger Joint is a burger joint located in خرطوم.

restaurants.name: شاورما أنس
restaurants.description: شاورما أنس is a arepa restaurant located in بحري كافوري.
restaurants.address: الخرطوم بحري (شارع الشفاء كافوري), بحري كافوري

restaurants.name: كاتي زلابيا آند بطاطس
restaurants.description: كاتي زلابيا آند بطاطس is a snack place located in خرطوم.

restaurants.name: Waffly وافلي
restaurants.description: Waffly وافلي is a creperie located in Al Kharţūm Baḩr.
restaurants.address: Kafouri opposite Noor Islamic Center, Al Kharţūm Baḩr, Al Kharţoum
